search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for HOVER (hover.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for HOVER is: [https://www.hover.com/domain-prices](https://www.hover.com/domain-prices)【3:0†source】.
